name: ANDRITZ HYDRO GmbH
goal: ANDRITZ HYDRO GmbH, a subsidiary of Andritz AG, is an energy service provider that markets and supplies electro-mechanical systems and services for hydropower plants. The company manufactures and supplies hydropower generation products such as Penstocks and Gates, Turbines, Hydro generators, Valves, Control, Protection and Excitation Systems, Electrical Power Systems, Online Monitoring and Diagnosis Systems. ANDRITZ HYDRO undertakes R&D activities in areas such as turbine designing, generator designing, automation and electrical power system.  ANDRITZ HYDRO is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: SET-Plan, Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe, ETIP SNET, RES-Directive, Water Framework Directive, Energy Efficiency, Electricity Market Design, Energy Union, HYDROPOWER EUROPE (under grant agreement No 826010)
